Package edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit

Interface Summary
GarbledBooleanCircuit GarbledBooleanCircuit is a general interface implemented by all garbled circuits--optimized or not.
GarbledGate An interface that StandardGarbledGate's and any specialized or optimized garbled gate will implement.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGarbledBooleanCircuit The AbstractGarbledBooleanCircuit class is an abstract representation of a circuit.
AbstractGarbledGate AbstractGarbledGate is an abstract class that implements the standard fields and methods that most garbled gates will share.
FreeXORGarbledBooleanCircuit The FreeXORGarbledBooleanCircuit uses the Free XOR technique that is explained in depth in Free XOR Gates and Applications by Validimir Kolesnikov and Thomas Schneider.
FreeXORGate See Free XOR Gates and Applications by Validimir Kolesnikov and Thomas Schneider for a full description of the Free XOR technique, pseudocode implementation, as well as the proof of security.
GarbledWire This class is a software representation a garbled Wire.
MinimizeAESSetKeyGarbledBooleanCircuit Our code is designed as such that in its constructor StandardGarbledBooleanCircuit constructs StandardGarbledGates.
MinimizeAESSetKeyGarbledGate MinimizeAESSetKeyGarbledBooleanCircuit takes on the role of both a garbled gate and an AES128MultiKeyEncryption in order to encypt the Gate while minimizing the number of AES setKey operations.
StandardGarbledBooleanCircuit The class is a Garbled Boolean Circuit without optimizations (e.g. the Free XOR technique and row reduction technique etc. are not used)
StandardGarbledGate This is a standard Garbled Gate.
 

Exception Summary
InputNotSetException
